Name: GLOBAL_SOFAConventionsVersion
Comment: Describes the version of the Conventions

Name: GLOBAL_License
Default: No license provided, ask the author for permission

Name: GLOBAL_Source
Comment: The method of production of the original data. If it was model-generated, source should name the model and its version, as specifically as could be useful. If it is observational, source should characterize it.

Name: GLOBAL_Title
Comment: A succinct description of what is in the dataset

Name: GLOBAL_References
Comment: Published or web-based references that describe the data or methods used to produce it

Name: GLOBAL_TimeCreated
Comment: will be updated when saving and not existing or empty

Name: GLOBAL_TimeModified
Comment: will be updated each time when saving

Name: GLOBAL_DatabaseName
Comment: name of the database to which these data belong

Name: GLOBAL_SubjectID
Comment: ID of the subject from the database
